ifications...

REST =3D=3D arch style, H=
TTP+URI =3D=3D an architecture (of the REST style) Apache, Firefox, Squid e=
tc are implementations of elements (connectors and components) of that arch=
itecture.

Sure you ca=
n - HTTP specifies such specifics for any implementations of connectors and=
 components. For exampe, HTTP specifies that GET is safe and therefore any =

ng about side effects.
